cont.entity_a: Marvel chipset bug causes Wi-Fi network crashes with Android devices. Router stops broadcasting on 2.4 GHz, requiring frequent reboots. 5 GHz band does not allow new users when 2.4 GHz fails. Router drops connections frequently, requiring power cycling. Router drops laptop wireless connection for no reason. Router disconnects from DSL modem frequently. Router stops working after storms, possibly sensitive to power surges. Router firmware is full of bugs and errors.
cont.entity_b: Router froze after a month and became unresponsive. Defective unit had a high drop rate, replaced with a D-Link 655.

cont.entity_a: Router's range is limited compared to other models.
cont.entity_b: Excellent range and does not drop signals. Router provides great wireless range and connection speed. Router increases signal strength dramatically. Router has better range but inconsistent signal strength.

cont.entity_a: Setup wizard has problems, better to configure via web interface.
cont.entity_b: Easy to set up and configure. Router setup was difficult but support was helpful.

cont.entity_a: Easy firmware modification for VPN setup. Supports open-source firmware like DD-WRT and OpenWRT. Advanced customization requires open-source firmware. Firmware issues cause frequent disconnections.
cont.entity_b: Firmware update resolved connectivity issues with DSL. Router firmware limits functionality and third-party support.

cont.entity_a: Handles multiple devices and heavy usage without complaints. Higher-speed Wi-Fi 5 GHz band performance is poor. 5 GHz radio has instability issues.
cont.entity_b: Significant improvement in signal and performance with enhanced cards.

cont.entity_a: Customer service is responsive but unable to fix issues. Linksys support is poor and not helpful.
cont.entity_b: Linksys tech support was helpful in resolving setup issues. Router setup was difficult but support was helpful.

cont.entity_a: Insecure connections and lack of user control.
Web interface is easy to navigate. Router is not recommended for non-technical users.
Router runs hot, causing operational problems. Requires frequent reboots to maintain functionality.
cont.entity_b: Router works well but needs frequent resets to maintain wireless connectivity.

cont.entity_a: Parental controls and other features are lacking.

cont.entity_b: Changing subnet address is not possible, limiting VPN remote access.
